question: Which Indian armed force has conducted ‘Exercise Topchi 2019’?
explanation: Indian Army has recently demonstrated its artillery firepower  by using ultra light Howitzers and indigenous Swathi weapon-locating radar at the annual \'Exercise Topchi 2019\'  at the vast firing ranges at Deolali Camp near Nasik, Maharashtra. The aviation and surveillance capabilities were also showcased in the Exercise. In addition to the gun fire, the display of rockets, missiles, surveillance and target acquisition radars, remotely piloted aircraft and hi-tech equipments was awe-inspiring.
